title: 217. Are You Ready for a Glorious Sunset?
description: We spend billions on end-of-life healthcare that doesn't do much good. So what if a patient could forego the standard treatment and get a cash rebate instead?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
